column1: Smoque BBQ////I was expecting so much given the great reviews this has
column2: but I was disappointed. The meat was dry
column3: definitely overcooked. The sauces were mediocre at best
column4: they certainly didn't do anything for the flavor of the meat but were necessary to combat the dryness. I feel like I must have gone on an off day after reading all the positive reviews
column5: but I'm certainly not jumping to try it again.
